title: Condo on High Floor with Patio and Amazin Views of Coors Field and Downtown
posting_body: An amazing opportunity to live at the thriving Coloradan - Downtown Denver.
A condominium community thoughtfully designed for life in the city.
Enjoy one of the most popular floor plans!
This immaculate unit on a HIGH floor boasts a large bedroom with custom-made double closets, smart shades system, in-unit laundry, and ample storage as well.
The beautiful kitchen has an abundance of counter space and high-end appliances.
An ample patio with unobstructed views of Mountains, Coors Field and Downtown Denver is a sight to see.

The Coloradan amenities include an 18th-floor pool deck/hot tub, entertaining club and game room, 24-hour front desk, owners’ lobby, and library, a curated art collection throughout the building, and a 5th-floor community garden and an outdoor kitchen including city and mountain views.
Enjoy the state-of-the-art fitness center with Peloton bikes, water rowers, TRX, and cardio machines.
Unit Upgrades: Motorized roller shades with remote and app control, including blackout shades in bedroom California Closets custom built-ins at entry and walk-in closet.

The Coloradan is perfectly located with high walkability to all the incredible downtown restaurants and nightlife, easy access to light rail, and restaurants, with close proximity to Whole Foods and King Soopers.
Don’t miss this opportunity to live at The Coloradan and experience Denver from your doorstep.
